title: My QR code is expired or invalid when using RCBC Scan to Withdraw What should I do
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My QR code is expired or invalid when using RCBC Scan to Withdraw. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39566605811993-My-QR-code-is-expired-or-invalid-when-using-RCBC-Scan-to-Withdraw-What-should-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you encountered an error after scanning the QR code on the ATM, check the ATM’s screen for the error message:

- **Your QR code has expired**\- After generating the QR, the code is only **valid for 5 minutes.** Please generate a new cash out QR code then scan it again.
- **Your QR code is invalid** \- Only QR codes generated through the GCash app's **_RCBC Scan to Withdraw_ page will be accepted** at RCBC ATMs. Please generate a new cash-out QR code and scan it again.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXf_t51jb32CyKJ718QDsWAQ6RpHNNBbZ35RuVWTMgxjXtgMp1c5s3I44Cg7QD0l2EaPSqBnq0MkOgsSiffzWtZHDHOvkp9DyTIsv8knCYykkOS2nqliDWYJyDrNOj03MwgED6lobSws8fmez6FqqoDNlo3R?key=2R5Srtp2xwdXgyoP5E86TA)![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXf9ic2rucVehYJo6mrpMWaajzmuDpdavQnE1HQn9ZDjK81sf1TVRVr9wgtZjD6FUvPlEgFCfcuKpqFRXX5ne2w1hjsj7AZ_MtN1bBm2s-ggKw8kzUkf4M61QjrRhnYVlL2tB--DCqHbG7fuIvZRkfs7LW8?key=2R5Srtp2xwdXgyoP5E86TA)

Here’s how to generate a cash out QR code:

1. On your GCash App, tap **View All Services**
2. Select **Cash Out**
3. Tap **RCBC Scan to Withdraw**
4. Select **Cash out via QR Code**
5. Input the amount to cash out and tap **Next**
6. Review your Cash Out details and tap **Proceed**
7. Enter the 6-digit authentication code sent to your GCash registered mobile number. Tap **Submit**
8. You’ll be led to a page with your Cash Out QR code
